project.howToCite: University of Basel Kings’ Valley Project Online (UBKVP), 2021, DaSCH. ark.dasch.swiss/ark:/72163/1/0805
project.teaserText: Assessment of tombs in the Kings’ Valley used for burials of royal family and entourage (ca. 1350 BCE), looted (ca. 1000 BCE), and reused for burials of members of priestly families (ca. 800–700 BCE).

description.en: Archaeological Project exploring undecorated tombs in the Valley of the Kings, Egypt

project.name: University of Basel Kings’ Valley Project
publications: Bickel, Susanne (ed.), Priester – Räuber – Königskinder. Die Gräber KV 40 und KV 64 im Tal der Könige. vol. 1. Die beschrifteten Objekte der 18. Dynastie und die Keramik Swiss Egyptological Studies 2.1, Basel 2021.
